properties.areaDesc: Western/Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 7:55PM MST until February 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected, the heaviest snowfall will occur
Wednesday evening. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Western/Central Fremont County Below 8500 Feet, Canon
City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County, Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo
County Below 6300 Feet, Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano
River Basin Below 7500 Feet and Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las
Animas County Below 7500 Feet.

* WHEN...From 2 PM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY
